description: Ruleset for material is 'cell specimen' or 'single cell specimen'.
title: FAANG sample metadata rules for 'cell specimen' or 'single cell specimen'.
name: faang_samples_purified_cells.metadata_rules

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

tissue_dissociation.name: Tissue dissociation
tissue_dissociation.description: The method by which tissues are dissociated into purified or single cells in suspension. Examples are 'proteolysis', 'mesh passage', 'fine needle trituration'. For blood, milk and other fluids, where there is no tissue dissociation use 'fluids'. Please contact FAANG DCC to add more terms.

cell_enrichment.name: Cell enrichment
cell_enrichment.description: The method by which specific cell populations are sorted or enriched, e.g. 'fluorescence-activated cell sorting (FACS)'. Please contact FAANG DCC to add more terms.

enrichment_markers.name: Enrichment markers
enrichment_markers.description: Description of the specificity markers used to isolate cell populations, e.g. 'CD45+'. Please contact FAANG DCC to add more terms.

cell_type.name: cell type
cell_type.description: Provide a cell type from the CL ontology.

single_cell_isolation.name: Single cell isolation
single_cell_isolation.description: The method by which individual cells, nuclei, or another portion are separated for individual barcoding. Examples are 'FACS', 'microfluidics', 'manual selection', 'droplet-based cell isolation'. Please contact FAANG DCC to add more terms.

single_cell_entity.name: Single cell entity
single_cell_entity.description: The type of single cell entity derived from isolation protocol e.g. 'whole cell', 'nucleus', 'cell-cell multimer', 'spatially encoded cell barcoding'. Please contact FAANG DCC to add more terms.

single_cell_quality.name: Single cell quality
single_cell_quality.description: Inspection type prior to cell lysis.

cell_number.name: Cell number
cell_number.description: For droplet experiments, the number of cells used as input for the library preparation, e.g. '5000'.

single_cell_isolation_protocol.name: Single cell isolation protocol
single_cell_isolation_protocol.description: Link to protocol describing how the single cells were separated into a single-cell suspension.

derived_from.name: Derived from
derived_from.description: Sample name or BioSample ID for a specimen record.
